description.ruby-sapphire:
Builds enormous power,
then slams the foe.
description.emerald:
Builds enormous power,
then slams the foe.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is slugged
at maximum power.
Can also be used
to move boulders.
description.diamond-pearl:
The foe is slugged
with a punch thrown
at maximum power.
It can also be used
to move boulders.

with a punch thrown
